item.title: Storage Administrator

item.title: IT Lead
item.description: 2019 July - 2020 June Full Stack Development Frontend (HTML5, CSS3, JS, Angular, React) Backend (Java EE, Python Flask, Python Django, Go, Node.js) Database (MySQL, MongoDB) Systems Administration Data Redundancy UPS System Cooldown System Autonomic Backup Network Administration Unix Server Administration

item.title: Tecnical Intern
item.description: 2018 July - 1 month Company: Feed Agency Development: email HTML & CSS (templates, modules) reusable code and modules (HTML, CSS, Handlebars, Grunt) QA: Tested with the QA team High support standard Desktop, Webmail and Mobile clients (65 supported devices) Real device & Email on Acid. Team work: daily meetings work closely with other members of the team (Devs QA testers, Project Managers, Account Managers, Designers, Copywriters) within the difference offices (London, Manchester, Berlin and San Francisco).

item.title: Rowing - Youth Monitor (Coach)
item.description: 2019 September - current Club: Club Canottieri Lugano Coach for the kids just starting with rowing, inspire, motivate, theach rowing tecnique and training. Train on the wather and indoor.

item.title: HPC Operations
item.description: 2019 June - 2019 July Company: CSCS (Swiss National Supercomputing Centre) Team: Network & Security During my degreee at SAMT, I had to do 2 month of intern in an IT company. I was lucky enouth to have my stage at CSCS in Lugano. At the end of the intern I was interviewed: Giulio Bosco: Il mio stage al CSCS Worked on: Network Performance Test (BBR & QUIC) Netflow & ElastiFlow (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) Load balancer (NAT vs DSR) DHCPv6 OSSEC Installation of switches and servers in machine room UNIX/Linux administration

item.title: SAP B1 Users Operations Support
item.description: 2020 July - current Company: Drytech International SA Responsability: Understanding of company flows Understanding of SAP Operations Manage SAP Data
